brief_title: Phase I/II Study of Monoclonal Factor IX Concentrate for Factor IX Deficiency
brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: Assess the safety and long-term efficacy of monoclonal factor IX concentrate in patients with factor IX deficiency.
detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Patients receive monoclonal factor IX replacement therapy as inpatients. Patients with a satisfactory response receive further therapy as needed for bleeding for up to 36 months at home.
criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA: Patients with factor IX deficiency.
